entry.title: Famous X Clear Glass Downstem – 115mm – Tray of 20
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous X
Type: Downstem
Price: 59.99

The Famous X Clear Glass Downstem provides clean, clear, ultra-smooth hits and looks great with any bong.

 

  • 115mm
  • Clear Glass
  • Percolation Slits
  • Frosted Ground Joint
  • Signature Famous X Black Star Logo
  • POP Display Tray Included

 

The Famous X Clear Glass Down Stem makes the perfect add-on for any bong!

This awesome essential accessory adds an extra level of water filtration to your smoking experience for hits that are as smooth as can be! The precision-cut percolation slits give you more control over your smoke and will allow for bigger and cleaner hits than ever before!

This handy little accessory is perfect for bong owners who want a smoother smoking experience. Its quality construction makes cleaning and maintenance a breeze, and with proper care, it will last for years. Its straight, minimalist design features clear glass with the Famous X signature Black Star logo and comes conveniently packaged ready-to-go POP display tray of 20.

entry.title: Glass Bowl with Handle – Female Joint
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution
Type: Herb Bowl
Price: 4.99

This functional and effective 14mm herb bowl is constructed from durable glass and features a female joint and a colored glass handle for safe and hassle-free removal. The handle also provides anti-roll stabilization by preventing the bowl from rolling away on flat surfaces.

  • Made from durable glass
  • Glass-on-glass joint
  • Colored glass handle
  • Anti-roll stabilization
  • 14mm female joint
  • Easy to clean and maintain

If you’re looking for an affordable, durable glass bowl as a back up or replacement part for a piece with a male joint, this one should do the trick. It’s designed for everyday use and will last for years with proper care.

Every now and again, it’s time to replace your bowl. This functional and effective 14mm replacement bowl is perfect your Dopezilla bong! It will match the aesthetic perfectly, is constructed from durable glass, and features a male joint with a clear glass handle. The handle also provides anti-roll stabilization by preventing the bowl from rolling away on flat surfaces.

  • Clear glass handle

  • 14mm male joint
  • Easy to clean and maintain

If you’re looking to replace your Dopezilla bowl, or simply looking for a quality, affordable bowl for any glass piece with a 14mm female joint, this replacement bowl is just the ticket! It’s designed for everyday use and will last for years with proper care.

It will match the aesthetic perfectly, is constructed from durable glass, and features a male joint with a clear glass handle. The handle also provides anti-roll stabilization by preventing the bowl from rolling away on flat surfaces.

entry.title: TPB Bowl
entry.summary:
Vendor: Trailer Park Boys
Type: Herb Bowl
Price: 5.45

The Boys are back in town, and greasssier than ever. Hailing from the iconic Sunnyvale Trailer Park, Ricky, Julian and Bubbles have created their own line of smoking accessories. It doesn’t take rocket appliances to know these pieces are better than the worst case Ontario.
This is the replacement bowl for the Trailer Park Boys line of water pipes. It’s a 14mm male, cone bowl perfect for dry herb. The handle is adorned with a cool TPB logo, and it will work as a replacement for any TPB water pipe or other piece requiring a 14mm male bowl. Easily keep it clean with 99% alcohol for a smoother smoking experience.
  • 14mm Branded TPB Bowl
  • Available in Black and White

entry.title: Bowl Glass with Honeycomb Screen w/ Nubs 18mm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant
Type: Herb Bowl
Price: 4.90

This bowl is made from borosilicate glass and is a 18mm male glass on glass fitting. It features a built-in honeycomb screen so you never have to worry about losing or breaking a removable screen. It also has a sturdy handle for easy removal from your bong. Available in clear, black and white.
